name: Merion Title and Trust Company of Ardmore Mortgage Trust Fund Case
name_abbreviation: Merion Title & Trust Co. of Ardmore Mortgage Trust Fund Case

judges: Before Schaffer, C. J.; Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Parker, J J.
parties: Merion Title and. Trust Company of Ardmore Mortgage Trust Fund Case.

opinions.text:
Pee Curiam,
The decree is affirmed on the above-qnoted portions of the opinion and supplemental opinion filed by Judge Knight in the court below. Costs to be paid by the appellant.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: Russell J. Brownbaelc, Avith him Roger B. Reynolds, for appellant.
John II. Longalcer, with him John W. Lord, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, Orville Brown, Deputy Attorney General, and Olaude T. Reno, Attorney General; for appellee,
casebody.head_matter:
Merion Title and. Trust Company of Ardmore Mortgage Trust Fund Case.
Argued January 27, 1942.
Before Schaffer, C. J.; Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Parker, J J.
Russell J. Brownbaelc, Avith him Roger B. Reynolds, for appellant.

March 23, 1942:
